sn46.3:1.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant is accomplished in ethics, immersion, knowledge, freedom, or the knowledge and vision of freedom, even the sight of them is very helpful, I say.
sn46.3:1.6: or go forth following them is very helpful, I say.
sn46.3:1.8: Because after hearing the teaching of such mendicants, a mendicant will live withdrawn in both body and mind,
sn46.3:1.9: as they recollect and think about that teaching.
sn46.3:2.1: At such a time, a mendicant has activated the awakening factor of mindfulness;
sn46.3:2.4: As they live mindfully in this way they investigate, explore, and inquire into that teaching with wisdom.
sn46.3:3.1: At such a time, a mendicant has activated the awakening factor of investigation of principles;
sn46.3:3.4: As they investigate principles with wisdom in this way their energy is roused up and unflagging.
sn46.3:4.1: At such a time, a mendicant has activated the awakening factor of energy; they develop it and perfect it.
sn46.3:4.2: When they’re energetic, spiritual rapture arises.
sn46.3:5.1: At such a time, a mendicant has activated the awakening factor of rapture; they develop it and perfect it.
sn46.3:5.2: When the mind is full of rapture, the body and mind become tranquil.
sn46.3:6.1: At such a time, a mendicant has activated the awakening factor of tranquility; they develop it and perfect it.
sn46.3:6.2: When the body is tranquil and one feels bliss, the mind becomes immersed in samādhi.
sn46.3:7.1: At such a time, a mendicant has activated the awakening factor of immersion; they develop it and perfect it.
sn46.3:7.2: They closely watch over that mind immersed in samādhi.
sn46.3:8.1: At such a time, a mendicant has activated the awakening factor of equanimity; they develop it and perfect it.
sn46.3:9.1: When the seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated in this way they can expect seven fruits and benefits.
sn46.3:9.3: They attain enlightenment early on in this very life.
sn46.3:9.4: If not, they attain enlightenment at the time of death.
sn46.3:9.5: If not, with the ending of the five lower fetters, they’re extinguished between one life and the next.
sn46.3:9.6: If not, with the ending of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished upon landing.
sn46.3:9.7: If not, with the ending of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished without extra effort.
sn46.3:9.8: If not, with the ending of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished with extra effort.
sn46.3:9.9: If not, with the ending of the five lower fetters they head upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm.
sn46.3:9.10: When the seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated in this way these are the seven fruits and benefits they can expect.”
